title: football-players.jpg
description: We see in the image two football players. The one in the left is wearing green tshirt and white shorts and is going to kick the ball. The player on the right, is the defender and he is wearing white tshirt and red shorts.

title: birthday party.jpg
description:
The picture shows five children at a birthday party.
There are three girls and two boys.
In the center, they have a cake with candles. To the right, they have a tray with other cakes. Four of the five children are wearing party hats, and in the background, behind them, balloons can be seen decorating the room.
